A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I watched the original SW episode IV 2 hours before watching The Last Jedi.  The difference in quality versus quantity between the two was so shocking I left the theater in a disturbed and almost numb mental state.  What a sad waste of plot lines\, characters and potential. There were so many pointless subplots and drawn out sequences I was literally bored\, annoyed and confused multiple times. So many nonsensical and disconnecting elements I literally lost count.  How is it even possible that the critic and fan reviews are so lopsided in the opposite direction of a franchise so universally beloved by fanboys? Because it embodies so little of what makes Star Wars great.  The story is pathetic and apathetic at the same time. What a complete waste.  Shamefully uninspiring.
